amendment.description: To modify the requirements and authorities of the Joint Intelligence Community Council.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3781 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3781 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S9914-9916; text: CR S9915-9916) To modify the requirements and authorities of the Joint Intelligence Community Council.
